verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Now the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יוֹנָ֥ה <S%H3124><s%> came unto Jonah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲמִתַּ֖י <S%H573><s%> of Amittai לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

ק֠וּם <S%H6965><s%> Arise לֵ֧ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to נִֽינְוֵ֛ה <S%H5210><s%> to Nineveh הָעִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> city הַגְּדוֹלָ֖ה <S%H1419><s%> that great וּקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> and cry עָלֶ֑יהָ <S%H5921><s%> against כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עָלְתָ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> is come up רָעָתָ֖ם <S%H7451><s%> against it for their wickedness לְפָנָֽי׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

וַיָּ֤קָם <S%H6965><s%> rose up יוֹנָה֙ <S%H3124><s%> But Jonah לִבְרֹ֣חַ <S%H1272><s%> to flee תַּרְשִׁ֔ישָׁה <S%H8659><s%> unto Tarshish מִלִּפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> from the presence יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיֵּ֨רֶד <S%H3381><s%> and went down יָפ֜וֹ <S%H3305><s%> to Joppa וַיִּמְצָ֥א <S%H4672><s%> and he found אָנִיָּ֣ה ׀ <S%H591><s%> a ship בָּאָ֣ה <S%H935><s%> going תַרְשִׁ֗ישׁ <S%H8659><s%> to Tarshish וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> so he paid שְׂכָרָ֜הּ <S%H7939><s%> the fare וַיֵּ֤רֶד <S%H3381><s%> thereof and went down בָּהּ֙ לָב֤וֹא <S%H935><s%> into it to go עִמָּהֶם֙ <S%H5973><s%> them תַּרְשִׁ֔ישָׁה <S%H8659><s%> with them unto Tarshish מִלִּפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> from the presence יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַֽיהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> But the LORD הֵטִ֤יל <S%H2904><s%> sent out רֽוּחַ־ <S%H7307><s%> wind גְּדוֹלָה֙ <S%H1419><s%> a great אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on הַיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> into the sea וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become סַֽעַר־ <S%H5591><s%> tempest גָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> and there was a mighty בַּיָּ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> in the sea וְהָ֣אֳנִיָּ֔ה <S%H591><s%> so that the ship חִשְּׁבָ֖ה <S%H2803><s%> was like לְהִשָּׁבֵֽר׃ <S%H7665><s%> to be broken

וַיִּֽירְא֣וּ <S%H3372><s%> were afraid הַמַּלָּחִ֗ים <S%H4419><s%> Then the mariners וַֽיִּזְעֲקוּ֮ <S%H2199><s%> and cried אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his אֱלֹהָיו֒ <S%H430><s%> unto his god וַיָּטִ֨לוּ <S%H2904><s%> and cast forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֵּלִ֜ים <S%H3627><s%> the wares אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which בָּֽאֳנִיָּה֙ <S%H591><s%> that [were] in the ship אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> into the sea לְהָקֵ֖ל <S%H7043><s%> to lighten מֵֽעֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> But וְיוֹנָ֗ה <S%H3124><s%> [it] of them But Jonah יָרַד֙ <S%H3381><s%> was gone down אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into יַרְכְּתֵ֣י <S%H3411><s%> into the sides הַסְּפִינָ֔ה <S%H5600><s%> of the ship וַיִּשְׁכַּ֖ב <S%H7901><s%> and he lay וַיֵּרָדַֽם׃ <S%H7290><s%> and was fast asleep

וַיִּקְרַ֤ב <S%H7126><s%> came אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> about רַ֣ב <S%H7227><s%> in abundance הַחֹבֵ֔ל <S%H2259><s%> pilot וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> to him and said ל֖וֹ מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> How לְּךָ֣ נִרְדָּ֑ם <S%H7290><s%> unto him What meanest thou O sleeper ק֚וּם <S%H6965><s%> ? arise קְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> call אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> upon thy God אוּלַ֞י <S%H194><s%> Perhaps יִתְעַשֵּׁ֧ת <S%H6245><s%> will think הָאֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> if so be that God לָ֖נוּ וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> we will not נֹאבֵֽד׃ <S%H6><s%> upon us that we perish

וַיֹּאמְר֞וּ <S%H559><s%> And they said אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his רֵעֵ֗הוּ <S%H7453><s%> to his fellow לְכוּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> Come וְנַפִּ֣ילָה <S%H5307><s%> and let us cast גֽוֹרָל֔וֹת <S%H1486><s%> lots וְנֵ֣דְעָ֔ה <S%H3045><s%> that we may know בְּשֶׁלְּמִ֛י <S%H7945><s%> for whose cause הָרָעָ֥ה <S%H7451><s%> this evil הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לָ֑נוּ וַיַּפִּ֙לוּ֙ <S%H5307><s%> [is] upon us So they cast גּֽוֹרָל֔וֹת <S%H1486><s%> lots וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> fell הַגּוֹרָ֖ל <S%H1486><s%> and the lot עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on יוֹנָֽה׃ <S%H3124><s%> upon Jonah

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> Then said אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him הַגִּידָה־ <S%H5046><s%> they unto him Tell נָּ֣א <S%H4994><s%> now לָ֔נוּ בַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after לְמִי־ <S%H4310><s%> whose הָרָעָ֥ה <S%H7451><s%> us we pray thee for whose cause this evil הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לָ֑נוּ מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What מְּלַאכְתְּךָ֙ <S%H4399><s%> business וּמֵאַ֣יִן <S%H370><s%> whence תָּב֔וֹא <S%H935><s%> comest מָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> What אַרְצֶ֔ךָ <S%H776><s%> common וְאֵֽי־ <S%H335><s%> how מִזֶּ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> account this עַ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> people אָֽתָּה׃ <S%H859><s%> He

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> to עִבְרִ֣י <S%H5680><s%> unto them I [am] an Hebrew אָנֹ֑כִי <S%H595><s%> I וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֞ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> the God הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> of heaven אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> and I יָרֵ֔א <S%H3373><s%> and I fear אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> which hath made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> the sea וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיַּבָּשָֽׁה׃ <S%H3004><s%> and the dry

וַיִּֽירְא֤וּ <S%H3372><s%> afraid הָֽאֲנָשִׁים֙ <S%H582><s%> Then were the men יִרְאָ֣ה <S%H3373><s%> afraid גְדוֹלָ֔ה <S%H1419><s%> aloud וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> and said אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> to him מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> How זֹּ֣את <S%H2063><s%> you עָשִׂ֑יתָ <S%H6213><s%> unto him Why hast thou done כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because יָדְע֣וּ <S%H3045><s%> knew הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <S%H582><s%> this? For the men כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because מִלִּפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> from the presence יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בֹרֵ֔חַ <S%H1272><s%> that he fled כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> because הִגִּ֖יד <S%H5046><s%> because he had told לָהֶֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> they

וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <S%H559><s%> Then said אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> to him מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What נַּ֣עֲשֶׂה <S%H6213><s%> they unto him What shall we do לָּ֔ךְ וְיִשְׁתֹּ֥ק <S%H8367><s%> may be calm הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> unto thee that the sea מֵֽעָלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> and כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> unto us? for the sea הוֹלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> wrought וְסֹעֵֽר׃ <S%H5590><s%> and was tempestuous

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> to שָׂא֙וּנִי֙ <S%H5375><s%> unto them Take me up וַהֲטִילֻ֣נִי <S%H2904><s%> and cast me forth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> into the sea וְיִשְׁתֹּ֥ק <S%H8367><s%> be calm הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> so shall the sea מֵֽעֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> and כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for יוֹדֵ֣עַ <S%H3045><s%> unto you for I know אָ֔נִי <S%H589><s%> I כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> on בְשֶׁלִּ֔י <S%H7945><s%> that for my sake הַסַּ֧עַר <S%H5591><s%> tempest הַגָּד֛וֹל <S%H1419><s%> this great הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this עֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וַיַּחְתְּר֣וּ <S%H2864><s%> rowed hard הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <S%H582><s%> Nevertheless the men לְהָשִׁ֛יב <S%H7725><s%> to bring אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַיַּבָּשָׁ֖ה <S%H3004><s%> [it] to the land וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יָכֹ֑לוּ <S%H3201><s%> but they could כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for הַיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> not for the sea הוֹלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> wrought וְסֹעֵ֖ר <S%H5590><s%> and was tempestuous עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> against

וַיִּקְרְא֨וּ <S%H7121><s%> Wherefore they cried אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> and said אָנָּ֤ה <S%H577><s%> We beseech thee יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> us נֹאבְדָ֗ה <S%H6><s%> we beseech thee let us not perish בְּנֶ֙פֶשׁ֙ <S%H5315><s%> life הָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> for this man's הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> of this וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> and lay עָלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> and דָּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> blood נָקִ֑יא <S%H5355><s%> innocent כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> O יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> for thou O LORD כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> you חָפַ֖צְתָּ <S%H2654><s%> as it pleased עָשִֽׂיתָ׃ <S%H6213><s%> hast done

וַיִּשְׂאוּ֙ <S%H5375><s%> So they took up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹנָ֔ה <S%H3124><s%> Jonah וַיְטִלֻ֖הוּ <S%H2904><s%> and cast him forth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַיָּ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> into the sea וַיַּעֲמֹ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> ceased הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> and the sea מִזַּעְפּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2197><s%> from her raging

וַיִּֽירְא֧וּ <S%H3372><s%> feared הָאֲנָשִׁ֛ים <S%H376><s%> the men יִרְאָ֥ה <S%H3373><s%> afraid גְדוֹלָ֖ה <S%H1419><s%> greatly אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַיִּֽזְבְּחוּ־ <S%H2076><s%> and offered זֶ֙בַח֙ <S%H2077><s%> a sacrifice לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וַֽיִּדְּר֖וּ <S%H5087><s%> and made נְדָרִֽים׃ <S%H5088><s%> vows

וַיְמַ֤ן <S%H4487><s%> had prepared יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Now the LORD דָּ֣ג <S%H1709><s%> fish גָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> a great לִבְלֹ֖עַ <S%H1104><s%> to swallow up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹנָ֑ה <S%H3124><s%> Jonah וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become יוֹנָה֙ <S%H3124><s%> And Jonah בִּמְעֵ֣י <S%H4578><s%> was in the belly הַדָּ֔ג <S%H1709><s%> of the fish שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <S%H7969><s%> three יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> days וּשְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <S%H7969><s%> and three לֵילֽוֹת׃ <S%H3915><s%> nights
